Html:
Been using it in Scala, and love it.

 http://www.artima.com/scalazine/articles/pattern_matching.html

I find it (pattern matching) extremely useful, and would love to

have it in TypeSafe

Cheers

This library implements pattern matching:

https://github.com/natefaubion/matches.js

Perhaps you can figure out how to make it a bit more type safe.
Pattern matching (like scala) and destructuring statements (as scala, coffeescript and livescript has) makes the code a joy to work with. Would be really nice to have in TypeScript.
